name: Life - Afterlife
description:
NOTE:How to play the game

find all 7 orbs and find your way out

this game lacks so many features like in game tutorial,ui,better sound design

a lot of bugs

and of course there is this feature i really wanted to implement and that is voice over but dont have time to do it

*Description of the game

You woke up and found yourself on world you have never seen before

You barely have memories of what happened right before you got there

But you do know that you are not there to have fun or take a vacation

But you are there because you need to do something very important

And that is to regain what is lost and that is your life

You will need to explore the vast terrain in order to regain your memories right before all of this happened

Your objective is to explore and find all memories and complete the story

Simple

But there is an important thing before you set on a new adventure

And that is to have fun

And realize that there is life after life 

That events we called death is only the beginning

Note: made this game as a tribute to Gamedev Unlocked who recently said his goodbyes on YouTube

So this game was very much inspired from game dev unlocked first game "Home is where one starts"

Enjoy!
